name: wrong-section-switch
description: Walkthrough of the process to move into a different section after enrolling in the wrong CRN.

events.content: I accidentally added the 7am section of CSC 225. Anyone know how to switch now that it's after add/drop?
Step 1: email the instructor of the section you want with your Poly ID and explain the mistake. Ask for approval to swap.
Make sure they explicitly say "approved to move into CRN ####". You’ll need that wording for the Registrar.
Once you have the approval email, submit the change via the Student Center "Class Adjustment Petition". Upload the professor’s email as documentation.
Registrar processes it in 1–2 business days. Until then you’re still on the 7am roster, so keep attending to avoid being dropped.
Thanks! I'll email the noon section prof right now.
